links.title: Inside Apple's Secret Plan to Develop and Build its Own Screens
links.description: Apple Inc. is designing and producing its own device displays for the first time, using a secret manufacturing facility near its California headquarters to make small numbers of the screens for testing purposes, according to people familiar with the situation.

messages.body: According to Bloomberg, $AAPL is using a secret facility in California to make screens for testing.

links.title: Inside Apple's Secret Plan to Develop and Build its Own Screens
links.description: Apple Inc. is designing and producing its own device displays for the first time, Bloomberg News reports. The company is using a secret manufacturing facility near its California headquarters to make small numbers of the screens for testing purposes, according to people familiar with the situation.

messages.body: $BB BlackBerry‚Äôs QNX OS to anchor Baidu‚Äôs Apollo autonomous driving platform https://t.co/Lqqj849kSj $BIDU $AAPL $NVDA $INTC

links.title: BlackBerry's QNX OS to anchor Baidu's Apollo autonomous driving platform
links.description: BlackBerry and Baidu have announced a collaboration through which the Canadian and Chinese companies will team up for a number of connected and autonomous vehicle initiatives. The duo have signed a statement of intent to make BlackBerry's QNX operating system the basis for Baidu's previously announced Apollo autonomous driving platform.
